# Usage
```bash
> pip3 install dyckviz
> dyckviz -h
usage: dyckviz [-h] [--dim DIM] [--word WORD] [-o O]

Rendering of Dyck promotions.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help   show this help message and exit
  --dim DIM    symbols, size
  --word WORD  single word to render
  -o O         output filename
```
